name: United States defined
text: §431:1-214  United States defined.  United States, when used to signify a place, means the states of the United States and the governments of Puerto Rico, American Samoa, Guam, the Northern Mariana Islands, the United States Virgin Islands, and the District of Columbia. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2; am L 1997, c 233, §3; am L 2011, c 68, §3]
